meanings.definition: The state of being threefold or triple.
meanings.sent1: In some cultures, the concept of trinities represents unity in diversity.
meanings.sent2: The trinities of red, blue, and yellow are primary colors.
meanings.sent3: The trinities of breakfast, lunch, and dinner keep us fueled throughout the day.
meanings.sent4: The trinities of past, present, and future shape our perception of time.
meanings.sent5: The trinities of body, mind, and spirit are interconnected in holistic health.

meanings.definition: A group or set of three closely related entities.
meanings.sent1: The trinities of father, mother, and child form a family unit.
meanings.sent2: The trinities of Earth, Mars, and Venus are known as terrestrial planets.
meanings.sent3: The trinities of breakfast, lunch, and dinner keep our stomachs satisfied.
meanings.sent4: The trinities of rock, paper, and scissors determine the winner in the game.
meanings.sent5: The trinities of past, present, and future are intertwined in the fabric of time.

meanings.definition: A triad or trio of individuals or things.
meanings.sent1: The trinities of Harry, Ron, and Hermione are famous characters in a book series.
meanings.sent2: The trinities of morning, afternoon, and evening mark the passage of time.
meanings.sent3: The trinities of breakfast, lunch, and dinner are the highlights of the day.
meanings.sent4: The trinities of beginning, middle, and end structure a well-told story.
meanings.sent5: The trinities of body, mind, and soul are essential for overall well-being.
